Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 13th overall pick, by Milwaukee in 2011...
Injured on 5/7/2011 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from Milwaukee to New York (A) on 5/23/2011 (Going to MIL: P P. Neshek, RF I. Suzuki. Going to NYA: RF B. Abreu, P M. Wise, P M. Barnes, P T. Jungmann, CF T. Robinson)...
Injured on 8/15/2013 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Injured on 6/21/2014 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 4 days...
Injured on 6/1/2015 with a Torn Tricep Muscle, out for 5-6 weeks...
Earned first career win on 4/8/2016...
Won World Championship with New York (A) in 2016...
Traded from New York (A) to Philadelphia on 3/2/2017 (Going to PHI: 2B D. Pedroia, RF B. Barnes, P M. Barnes, P A. Schuette. Going to NYA: P N. Feliz, CF B. Sieben)...
Had first career hit (triple) on 4/28/2018, off Brian Matusz (ATL)...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 8/1/2018, going 4-0, 0.87...
Won World Championship with Philadelphia in 2018...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 8/1/2019, going 4-0, 1.44...
Hit first career homerun on 5/31/2020, off Earl Lipton (NYN)...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
Struck out 17 batters against Florida on 8/18/2020...
